alerts.clearReset: This will clear the whole canvas. Are you sure?
alerts.couldNotCopyToClipboard: Couldn't copy to clipboard. Try using Chrome browser.
alerts.uploadedSecurly: The upload has been secured with end-to-end encryption, which means that Excalidraw server and third parties can't read the content.

toolBar.lock: Keep selected tool active after drawing

hints.linearElement: Click to start multiple points, drag for single line
hints.linearElementMulti: Click on last point or press Escape or Enter to finish
hints.resize:
You can constrain proportions by holding SHIFT while resizing,
hold ALT to resize from the center
hints.rotate: You can constrain angles by holding SHIFT while rotating

errorSplash.clearCanvasCaveat: This will result in loss of work
errorSplash.openIssueMessage_pre: We were very cautious not to include your scene information on the error. If your scene is not private, please consider following up on our
errorSplash.openIssueMessage_post: Please include information below by copying and pasting into the GitHub issue.

roomDialog.desc_intro: You can invite people to your current scene to collaborate with you.
roomDialog.desc_privacy: Don't worry, the session uses end-to-end encryption, so whatever you draw will stay private. Not even our server will be able to see what you come up with.
roomDialog.desc_inProgressIntro: Live-collaboration session is now in progress.
roomDialog.desc_persistenceWarning: Note that the scene data is shared across collaborators in a P2P fashion, and not persisted to our server. Thus, if all of you disconnect, you will loose the data unless you export it to a file or a shareable link.
roomDialog.desc_shareLink: Share this link with anyone you want to collaborate with:
roomDialog.desc_exitSession: Stopping the session will disconnect your from the room, but you'll be able to continue working with the scene, locally. Note that this won't affect other people, and they'll still be able to collaborate on their version.

encrypted.tooltip: Your drawings are end-to-end encrypted so Excalidraw's servers will never see them.
